__e: Detective, he killed her, and then, out of guilt, he took his own life.

I'm so sorry, but the truth is he was so broken that he didn't even know it was your birthday when he took his life.
Because I'm not the idiot who took his idiot clothes off!

Shrugged off her clothes because she wanted to feel the air and not herself.
